      • getAD

        public abstract View getAD(int position)
        request the In-Stream ad.
        the SDK will check if the ad has been added in the DataSet by this position.
        it refers to the initADListener() you implement.
        Parameters:
        position - the DataSet's position
        Returns:
        the In-Stream ad

      • getAD

        public abstract View getAD(int position,
         int width)
        request the In-Stream ad
        Parameters:
        position - the DataSet's position
        width - the ad's width which you want to resize
        Returns:
        the In-Stream ad
